languages.text: {n}Хищная усмешка служит вам ответом.{/n} "Проницательно. Мы не имели прежде дел с этим Калькасаром и не доверяли ему. Две стаи — вдвое больше глаз, чтобы присматривать за его хитростями и махинациями. Да и потом..."

{n}You receive a wolfish grin in response.{/n} "Insightful. We'd had no dealings with this Calcazar before this and we did not trust him. Two packs meant twice as many eyes to watch out for his games and schemes. And then..."
languages.original_text: {n}Хищная усмешка служит вам ответом.{/n} "Проницательно. Мы не имели прежде дел с этим Калькасаром и не доверяли ему. Две стаи — вдвое больше глаз, чтобы присматривать за его хитростями и махинациями. Да и потом..."

languages.text: {n}乌尔法对你露出了狼一样的笑容。{/n}“你的话很有见地。我们在这之前，并没有和这个卡尔卡扎打过交道，我们也并不相信他。派出两支狼群，意味着会有两倍的眼睛留意他的计划与手段。不仅如此……”
languages.original_text: {n}You receive a wolfish grin in response.{/n} "Insightful. We'd had no dealings with this Calcazar before this and we did not trust him. Two packs meant twice as many eyes to watch out for his games and schemes. And then..."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法对你露出了狼一样的笑容。{/n}“你的话很有见地。我们在这之前，并没有和这个卡尔卡扎打过交道，我们也并不相信他。派出两支狼群，意味着会有两倍的眼睛留意他的计划与手段。不仅如此……”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Recibes una sonrisa hambrienta por respuesta.{/n} «Buena intuición. No habíamos tratado antes con el tal Calcazar y no confiábamos en él. Con dos jaurías tendríamos el doble de ojos vigilando sus artimañas. Y entonces...».
languages.original_text: {n}You receive a wolfish grin in response.{/n} "Insightful. We'd had no dealings with this Calcazar before this and we did not trust him. Two packs meant twice as many eyes to watch out for his games and schemes. And then..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Recibes una sonrisa hambrienta por respuesta.{/n} «Buena intuición. No habíamos tratado antes con el tal Calcazar y no confiábamos en él. Con dos jaurías tendríamos el doble de ojos vigilando sus artimañas. Y entonces...».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}あなたに向けられたのは、狼のごとき笑みだった。{/n}「なかなか聡明だ。我々はこれまで、カルカサルと遣り取りをすることもなく、信用もしていなかった。2つの群れは、ヤツの遊びや企みを監視する目が2倍あるということを意味する。そして…」
languages.original_text: {n}You receive a wolfish grin in response.{/n} "Insightful. We'd had no dealings with this Calcazar before this and we did not trust him. Two packs meant twice as many eyes to watch out for his games and schemes. And then..."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたに向けられたのは、狼のごとき笑みだった。{/n}「なかなか聡明だ。我々はこれまで、カルカサルと遣り取りをすることもなく、信用もしていなかった。2つの群れは、ヤツの遊びや企みを監視する目が2倍あるということを意味する。そして…」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Als Antwort erhältst du nur ein wölfisches Grinsen.{/n} "Scharfsinnig. Wir hatten mit diesem Calcazar zuvor nie zu tun und wir haben ihm nicht vertraut. Zwei Rudel bedeutete doppelt so viele Augen, die sich vor seinen Spielchen und Intrigen hüten konnten. Und dann ..."
languages.original_text: {n}You receive a wolfish grin in response.{/n} "Insightful. We'd had no dealings with this Calcazar before this and we did not trust him. Two packs meant twice as many eyes to watch out for his games and schemes. And then..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Als Antwort erhältst du nur ein wölfisches Grinsen.{/n} "Scharfsinnig. Wir hatten mit diesem Calcazar zuvor nie zu tun und wir haben ihm nicht vertraut. Zwei Rudel bedeutete doppelt so viele Augen, die sich vor seinen Spielchen und Intrigen hüten konnten. Und dann ..."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Un sourire de loup accueille votre remarque.{/n} « Une remarque pertinente. Nous n'avions jamais traité avec ce Calcazar par le passé et nous ne lui faisions pas confiance. Deux meutes, c'est deux fois plus d'yeux pour surveiller ses petits jeux et ses manigances. Et puis... »
languages.original_text: {n}You receive a wolfish grin in response.{/n} "Insightful. We'd had no dealings with this Calcazar before this and we did not trust him. Two packs meant twice as many eyes to watch out for his games and schemes. And then..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un sourire de loup accueille votre remarque.{/n} « Une remarque pertinente. Nous n'avions jamais traité avec ce Calcazar par le passé et nous ne lui faisions pas confiance. Deux meutes, c'est deux fois plus d'yeux pour surveiller ses petits jeux et ses manigances. Et puis... »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}You receive a wolfish grin in response.{/n} "Insightful. We'd had no dealings with this Calcazar before this and we did not trust him. Two packs meant twice as many eyes to watch out for his games and schemes. And then..."

languages.text: {n}Cevap olarak bir kurt gülümsemesi alıyorsun.{/n} "Öngörülüsün. Calcazar denen şahısla bundan önce hiç iş yapmamıştık, ona güvenmiyorduk. İki sürü demek, onun oyunları ve entrikalarını görecek iki kat göz demekti. Fakat sonra..."
languages.original_text: {n}You receive a wolfish grin in response.{/n} "Insightful. We'd had no dealings with this Calcazar before this and we did not trust him. Two packs meant twice as many eyes to watch out for his games and schemes. And then..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cevap olarak bir kurt gülümsemesi alıyorsun.{/n} "Öngörülüsün. Calcazar denen kişiyle bundan önce hiç iş yapmamıştık ve ona güvenmiyorduk. İki sürü demek, onun oyunları ve entrikalarını görecek iki kat göz demekti. Fakat sonra..."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
